Everyone still hacks.. disappointing, otherwise a good game itsj ust you cant enjoy ranked because even the AVERAGE players who go 1-1 kda hack, which is unbelievable. Some just choose to keep ONLY wall hacks on where as others choose to toggle their bot on when they need to. Pretty much ppl learn how to hide their hacks and mix it in with their pretending to not hack by purposely taking deaths and turning off toggle when your the last alive,small shit to keep ppl from thinking ur not legit. Its always been like this tho was hoping it woulda changed but nope same old shit.
